glyph.name: First Presence
glyph.description: The practice of conscious arrival - becoming fully present before engaging with any person, situation, or task.
glyph.practice: Three conscious breaths, feeling your feet on the ground, acknowledging: "I am here now."

interpretation:
A slow breath stirs motes of dust in a sunbeam.
Bare feet settle upon cool, dark earth.
A single dewdrop holds the quiet, waking world.
visualPhrases: A slow breath stirs motes of dust in a sunbeam.
Bare feet settle upon cool, dark earth.
A single dewdrop holds the quiet, waking world.
